string-array.name: settings_tips_message
string-array.item: "1. Turn off portable hotspot, Mi Share, or casting on your mobile device before using this feature. 2. Turn off Wi-Fi on both your mobile device and computer. 3. Make sure your mobile device is close to your computer. You won't be able to connect devices if they are in different places."
Your computer uses Bluetooth to detect nearby mobile devices that have been previously connected. Check whether Bluetooth is turned on on your mobile device.

"Mobile devices can't sync data with computers when the screen is locked. By default, this app doesn't allow locking the screen when your mobile device is connected to a computer. You can change this in the Settings."

"1. Compatible mobile devices: Mi 11, Mi 10 Ultra, Mi 10 Pro, Mi 10, Mi 9 Pro 5G, Mi 9, Redmi K30s Ultra, Redmi K20 Pro, Redmi K30 Pro. If you're redirected to our official website after scanning the QR code, your device isn't supported yet. 2. Compatible computers: 小米笔记本Pro 15 增强版, 小米笔记本Pro 15.6\" 2020款, Redmi G 游戏本, RedmiBook 16, RedmiBook 14 II, RedmiBook Air 13. Download MIUI+ Beta for your computer here: https://plus.miui.com."

string-array.name: settings_tips_title
string-array.item: Не можете да се свържете чрез QR код?
Не можете да намерите мобилни устройства с Вашия компютър?
Не можете да заключите мобилното си устройство?
